Reviews.Title: “Anastasia”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a NH Hoteles traveler
Reviews.Content: end may five days wife excellent location next park tram across street minutes downtown since exactly city centre quiet room neat floor fine view city centre breakfast buffet good got better price room compared hotels center amsterdam would recommend anybody looking hotel sleep well eat breakfast wants anywhere amsterdam within 30 minutes

Reviews.Title: “Very average hotel”
Reviews.Author: mrijay
Reviews.Content: 24 hours learned daughter husband en route amsterdam husband flying tokyo didnt time book hotel traveling netherlands checking daughters status walked hotel close hospital told could two rooms one husband one 4 nights june 10 11 12 13 said would take twice asked stay told might able give us one room check morning sure didnt sound like going room made arrangements nights returned hotel night told supposed checked morning reservation number explained walked sunday didnt advance reservation 11pm handed bags packed hotel staff young woman desk obviously annoyed manager placed difficult position never offered help us find another hotel fortunately able contact hotel planned move next day took us taxi driver said second people hotel day obviously hotel overbooked shabby way treat clients also charged us rooms told checked unfortunately didnt anything writing show told next time well know

Reviews.Title: “conveniently located - nice - friendly & helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: InternetUser42
Reviews.Content: nice peaceful stay excellent neighborhood hotel situated 10 minutes tram bus away city center near tropen museum however stop outside hotel trams buses pass often could easily access center go wherever wanted neighborhood nice calm thankfully room 7th floor excellent view park nearby bit small comfortable clean woke every morning listening singing amazing staff friendly breakfast enough included price room hotel simple nicely decorated enjoyed stay next visit amsterdam shall absolutely book

Reviews.Title: “pleasantly surprised.....”
Reviews.Author: eliott69
Reviews.Content: clean rooms friendly staff 7 min bus tram dam good value money

Reviews.Title: “nice stay in the Madrid center”
Reviews.Author: silencd
Reviews.Content: first things first working company made hotel arrangements idea room cost even level room think standard room 7th floor hotel mixed bag get big things right small things terribly wrong hotel located bit street bit hard find first time directly behind tram stop right side street youre leaving city center entering hotel property strange gate top enter courtyard lobby fairly decorated modern fashion barrestaurant back overlooking breakfast room one side also windows park front desk located right across lifts allowing staff keep eye things security ok despite strange balcony mentioned previous reviews need room key get lifts checkin easy prebooked handed keycard dont know experiences would room indeed small fairly nicely laid adequate bed firm two side tables desk chair one additional side chair nice wardrobe bath small shower adequate one problem towels replenished regular fashion number size towels varied day day never replenished small soaps away minute problems wakeup call never came although time discovered tv easy use alarm reported door broken get closed never repaired despite elevator lobby floor two table one broken minor problems also present nothing extraordinary combined give impression hotel wasnt trying hard breakfast ok wasnt paying included room usual coffee meats cheeses cereal fruit etc also cooked eggs sausage bacon worried location actually fine number 9 tram stop right outside runs frequently throughout daytime stops midnight actually walked city center several times safe 30 minute walk easy actually walked back 200 one morning problems whatsoever several people street well area bit ok weekend street market street shops arent terribly interesting several restaurants bars close also coffee shop sort thing park nice morning walk run get odd night far possibly find area seemed safe normal amsterdam decent stay certainly better choices closer middle town would fairly easy get driving since located right main road connects directly ring road dont need drive anywhere near center town

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: silviahg
Reviews.Content: stayed nh tropen four nights june overall nice hotel comfortable room stayed 8th floor nice city tropen museum view great beds problem caught days 28 29 degrees room didnâ€™t air conditioning also one balcony surrounding building every stage makes easy access room another anyone would want didnâ€™t even risk sleeping window open itâ€™s little strange donâ€™t create individual balconies room easy understand usually amsterdam itâ€™s typical hot weather city even pity nice hotel fail area bit difficult get good night sleep real shame comfortable room bed staff great always answering questions city giving us directions hotel little bit centre tram stops right front turns easy reach main sites problem location last tram runs midnight hey amsterdam get night friendly want stay downtown little longer catch taxi get back hotel loved amsterdam itâ€™s lovely city especially area along canals go seven bridges enjoy beautiful romantic ambiance would recommend hotel hot days summer check detail weather report go

Reviews.Title: “it is a bit of a tired hotel”
Reviews.Author: JasonWD
Reviews.Content: really nice place stayed several areas city bad tram pretty quick taxis night get back easily make sure pocket change car parking lot pretty secure area quiet night would definitely stay remodeled interior also nice bathroom tremendous

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: heiranig
Reviews.Content: location one hotel center take 7 9 tram 9 grand centraal takes 2030 minutes good bad located beautiful relaxing however go park night changes regular people enjoying nature young giving dirty looks metro amsterdam almost useless need take tram bus bus especially night get anywhere centrally located 2 days learned walk back last night problems taking walk around 3am back hotel center rooms tiny double views park city cool seriously rooms cramped food crazy overpriced 13 euros breakfast dont think service excellent front desk courteous attentive way cab schipol airport 45 euros takes around 20 minutes almost late morning flight last night fell asleep checked us quickly called cab 5 minutes paid around 120 per night room hotels near center around red light district wouldnt stay ever sounds nice youre booking dissapointed get early none would stay good fine walking amsterdam hard navigate follow canal

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel nice location”
Reviews.Author: marcel dam
Reviews.Content: two others recently stayed nh tropen room 3 people bit small rather nice warning floors really nice carpeted waking taking shower cold floor pleasant corner room overlooking park staff inviting warm friendly breakfast though included nice fresh bread croissants fruit cereals juices coffee tea water milk yogurt every morning even breakfasts ending time tram 9 take centraal station hotels stop right next door tropen museum interesting like would definitely stay hotel recommend

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel.”
Reviews.Author: g8-1tourguest
Reviews.Content: stayed nh tropen last weekend 18 2004 enjoyed much location excellent walk 15 zoo around corner rooms nice new ask renovated rooms top floors nice view amsterdam staff friendly plenty including park small fee save hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good location, nice hotel though could do with an update”
Reviews.Author: Begonia21
Reviews.Content: centrally located good thing plenty whole wall places nearby tram practically outside front door mention taxi stand close staff great recommend top floor views

Reviews.Title: “ideal for business trip”
Reviews.Author: Terence_Hill
Reviews.Content: hotel clean decent size friendly staff good value money good quality room quiet international tv good free wifi good location however far center lot near hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice room, mediocre service”
Reviews.Author: gisaster25
Reviews.Content: reason hotel still well business people need close maria de hotel staff hardly speak english quite rude food average price pay hotel get meals good restaurants downtown stay away

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for leisure or bussiness”
Reviews.Author: jpgjpg
Reviews.Content: stayed two nights short city trip really nice stay hotel located far away historical city center subway stations two different lines near walk away subway reach central puerta del sol 10 minutes surrounding streets multiple restaurants bars also supermarket meters away really conveniently located tourists visiting madrid room surprisingly spacious location also bathroom quite large windows ie daylight clean comfortable complaints staff friendly helpful showed towards us surely high class unfortunately got robbed city hotel helped us calling speaking police delayed payment money credit cards left also problem good service three days stayed dealt staff could speak good english problems though dont speak spanish highly recommend hotel tourists visiting city madrid

Reviews.Title: “doubts about the Emperatriz”
Reviews.Author: rosstucker
Reviews.Content: allocated hotel thru last secret hotel deal upon finding name reading reviews expecting worse gladly wasnt case staff arrival helpful spoke good english spanish room fine choice colour decoration im holiday spend time fine excellent shower good location close 2 metro stations also within walking distance everywhere basically good value price think reviewers overlooked writing

Reviews.Title: “Loved the room and the hotel staff”
Reviews.Author: Gordi79
Reviews.Content: starred 4 shall give 3 located business district hotel good access metro short distance every brand new find worn details every thing works well clean breakfast good

Reviews.Title: “Great smaller hotel in Madrid”
Reviews.Author: ontravel
Reviews.Content: usually like nh hotels one hesperia managed nh good choice location ok close underground station line 10 line 5 buses also close street however hotel far 4 stars classic rooms small dont say anything could finish room bed pretty small days breakfast bad breakfast many advertised hotel poor variety queues morning staff ask boiled egg wait forever price good would return hotel
